attributes.action: Stop DVLA providing our personal information to commercial organisations such as car park companies
attributes.additional_details:
Car parking & wheel clamping companies are often thuggish and threatening.   They use unacceptable tactics such as hiding their signage & sending documents designed to look like official fines.
This behaviour can cause fear and unhappiness for many citizens and even cause harm to vulnerable groups.
We trust the DVLA with our personal information and Demand that the DVLA keep it safe from these companies.
